mapper.select: select id, logger_name, log_level, trace_id, rpc_id, now_time, log, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user from sys_trace_log where delete_flag = 0 and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_trace_log( id, logger_name, log_level, trace_id, rpc_id, now_time, log, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user) values (#{id}, #{loggerName}, #{logLevel}, #{traceId}, #{rpcId}, #{nowTime}, #{log}, #{createDate}, #{createUser}, #{deleteFlag}, #{remark}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from sys_trace_log where delete_flag = 0
and ${item.name} ${item.symbol} #{item.data}
